meanings.definition: Of or relating to the gums.
meanings.sent1: The dentist examined her gingival tissue carefully.
meanings.sent2: Proper oral hygiene is essential for good gingival health.
meanings.sent3: The gingival area seemed to be smiling back at the dentist.
meanings.sent4: Her gingival smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The gingival color of his gums was a healthy pink.

meanings.sent1: She brushed her teeth and gently massaged her gingival.
meanings.sent2: The dentist checked her gingival for any signs of inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The little girl giggled as the dentist tickled her gingival during the check-up.
meanings.sent4: The gingival of the patient's smile revealed years of neglect.
meanings.sent5: His gingival bled easily, indicating a need for better oral care.
